ALBench.trainer.trainer_impl.passive_trainer module¶

class ALBench.trainer.trainer_impl.passive_trainer.PassiveTrainer(trainer_config, dataset, model_fn, model_config, metric)¶

Bases: src.skeleton.trainer_skeleton.Trainer

train(finetune_model=None, finetune_config=None)¶

Train a model.

Parameters

  • log (bool) – Flag indicating whether to log training metrics.

  • finetune_model (Optional[torch.nn.Module]) – Warm start model if indicated.

  • finetune_config (Optional[Dict]) – Warm start model hyper-parameters.

trainer_name = 'passive'¶
